topic.shortdesc: The <dita> element provides a top-level container for multiple topics when you create documents using the ditabase document type. The <dita> element lets you create any sequence of concept, task, and reference topics, and the ditabase document type lets you further nest these topic types inside each other. The <dita> element has no particular output implications; it simply allows you to create multiple topics of different types at the same level in a single document.

body.section: Contained byNot contained by any other element. The root element for the compound DITA document type.

section.p: Use the generic topic structure for untyped topics. Topic elements
